duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive quality assurance and verification strategies to ensure data-driven, trusted, and sustainable digital transformation.
Lead end-to-end coordination and integration testing, working collaboratively with multiple product teams to ensure high-quality outcomes.
Ensure effective communication and collaboration among teams, fostering a culture of strong teamwork and shared success.
Provide advisory and consulting services for test solutions, leveraging expertise to drive quality and efficiency.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
